```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggridges)
library(patchwork)
library(readxl)
library(readr)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	warning = FALSE,
	fig.width = 8, 
  fig.height = 6,
  out.width = "90%"
)

theme_set(theme_minimal() + theme(legend.position = "bottom"))

options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)

scale_colour_discrete = scale_colour_viridis_d
scale_fill_discrete = scale_fill_viridis_d
```

## data import 

### health ranking data

```{r}
ny_hr2019 = read_excel('grace/ny_hr19.xls', sheet = 'Outcomes & Factors SubRankings', skip = 1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  slice(-c(1)) %>% 
  select(-ends_with("z"), -fips)

ny_hr2020 = read_excel('data1/ny_hr20.xlsx', sheet = 'Outcomes & Factors SubRankings', skip = 1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  slice(-c(1)) %>% 
  select(-ends_with("z"), -fips)

ny_hr2021 = read_excel('data1/ny_hr21.xlsx', sheet = 'Outcomes & Factors SubRankings', skip = 1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  slice(-c(1)) %>% 
  select(-ends_with("z"), -fips)

ny_hr2022 = read_excel('data1/ny_hr22.xlsx', sheet = 'Outcomes & Factors SubRankings', skip = 1) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  slice(-c(1)) %>% 
  select(-ends_with("z"), -fips)
```

### covid data

```{r}
ny_test = read_csv('grace/ny_covidtest.csv') %>% 
janitor::clean_names() %>% 
rename(date_mdy = test_date)

ny_death = read_csv("grace/ny_coviddeaths.csv") %>% 
janitor::clean_names() %>% 
rename(date_mdy = report_date)

ny_vax = read_csv("grace/ny_covidvax.csv") %>% 
janitor::clean_names() %>% 
select(-region) %>%
rename(date_mdy = report_as_of)
```
